remarks: The predicate " ` W ` is a topological left module".  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
istlm.s $e |- .x. = ( .sf ` W ) $.
istlm.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
istlm.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
istlm.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` F ) $.
istlm $p |- ( W e. TopMod <-> ( ( W e. TopMnd /\ W e. LMod /\ F e. TopRing ) /\ .x. e. ( ( K tX J ) Cn J ) ) ) $.
